Posts.Content: IÂ am experinceing back pain as well I am at the end of my chemo going to start radiation within the next month. Needed to know does it get better physcial therapy? That's what my Doc is telling me to do. So if you have any new information please write me back. I also feel like my Doc isn't sharing all that he/she needs to be tell me. I sometimes feel LOST without informatiom so if you could write back I will be very grateful.
Posts.Title: back pain during and after chemo
